channel.title: Lombok on JScott.me
channel.description: Recent content in Lombok on JScott.me

item.title: Lombok: Towards beautiful Java code
item.description: def gcd(x: Long, y: Long): Long = if (y == 0) x else gcd(y, x % y) Can you tell me what this code does? data class User(val name: String, val age: Int) What about this? The first is a Scala implementation of Euclid’s algorithm for calculating the greatest common divisor. It says that if y is 0, the GCD of x and y is x, otherwise it’s the GCD of y and x mod y.
